description: In 2008, the founder of the Playboy empire sat down with The New York Times to talk about his influences, his well-publicized lifestyle and his labor of love.
title: The Last Word: Hugh Hefner
title_page: The Last Word: Hugh Hefner - Video - NYTimes.com
text: In 2008, the founder of the Playboy empire sat down with The New York Times to talk about his influences, his well-publicized lifestyle and his labor of love.
